title: Part A

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Identification (1 point)

Z* W

Description (1 point)

· Fewer offspring will develop/survive.

· 1/4 of the offspring are predicted to die.

· Some of her offspring will have the Z* chromosome/all of her male offspring will have a Z* chromosome.
